experience: You and Holly both know Gelie Akhenblit, Lynda Bishop, and 7 others

Providing luxury apparel by appointment.  Men's custom shirts and trousers and personalized suits, sportcoats and tuxedos. Ready to wear items including polos, sweaters, knit tees, denim, outerwear, belts, cufflinks, and more. In the past 7 years I have helped hundreds of men with their professional and social wardrobes. See the full line at www.hollymajcher@jhilburn.com

Vice President, Americas Sales at OpenSignal
January 13, 2012, Greg was a client of Holly’s

Holly has been my style consultant for over 3 years, and simply put, she is the best.  Holly has a great understanding of current men's fashion trends (for both business and casual clothing), and does a great job helping to select the right fit for a given person's body type.  J. Hilllburn has a quality product, and my level of satisfaction is 100%.  If you are at all interested in custom tailored clothing, I really recommend you give Holly a call.  Greg KustudiaVP.
